channel.title: Hey I need some client help. plz look
channel.description:
Ok on the client i have im changing the background bc i dont like it and the only two things i wanna take off is the runescape icon and the flames. can anyone tell me how to take them off its really annoying. here is a pic
[img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/artclient.jpg[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 05:18:42 pm[/size][hr]I really need help with this plz.. =\ :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 05:19:51 pm[/size][hr]plz someone help??? :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 05:41:49 pm[/size][hr]Will somebody help me????

item.title: Hey I need some client help. plz look
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“bloodmaniet, post:1, topic:290143”]Ok on the client i have im changing the background bc i dont like it and the only two things i wanna take off is the runescape icon and the flames. can anyone tell me how to take them off its really annoying. here is a pic

artclient.jpg764×539
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 05:18:42 pm[/size][hr]I really need help with this plz… =\ [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 05:19:51 pm[/size][hr]plz someone help??? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2009, 05:41:49 pm[/size][hr]Will somebody help me???[/quote]

This is SERVER help. I don’t believe you’re aloud to post client related posts here. Someone else’s post got locked with something just about the same as this.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey I need some client help. plz look
item.description:
@0987654321234567890 wrote:

If the flames don’t move heres a simple way. Open the .png file with paint or whatever you use to edit photos. then just cut the parts you dont like out and replace them with whatever you want.

Read full topic
